item.title:
‘BLACK MIRROR’ creator Charlie Brooker toyed with ChatGPT by having it write an episode of the series which, according to him, was “sh-t.”
“All it’s done is look up all the synopses of [other] episodes & mush them together… there’s not actually any real original thought here.”
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
The trailer for ‘GOOD OMENS’ season 2 has been released.
The new season debuts on Prime Video on July 28.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Charli XCX’s “Trophy” is also featured in the film’s trailer.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Charli XCX composed the score for Emma Seligman’s ‘BOTTOMS’ alongside Leo Birenberg.
The film stars Ayo Edebiri and Rachel Sennott. It will be released in theaters on August 25, 2023.
item.author: FilmUpdates
